episodes.title: I sent a letter to the State Attorneys in Norway
episodes.description:
I sent a letter to the State Attorneys in Norway who are lawyers for the state against Jehovah's Witnesses to explain how Jehovah's Witnesses in several areas violate various laws and statutes. The letter describes several areas where they violate laws and statutes, the lawyers are of course familiar with these laws already, but these are the legal provisions they use in the trial and how it violates the Watchtower's own quotes in the literature Especially about the exclusion process.

https://www.reddit.com/r/exjw/comments/1iovl9p/a_letter_i_sent_to_the_state_attorneys_with/

Journey to heaven with Mr. Doe to witness the founders of the Jehovah's Witness religion stand trial for the crimes they have committed against Jesus; truly an apostate's dream!

episodes.title: Czechia:  Jehovah’s Witnesses Risk losing their Registration
episodes.description:
he Ministry of Culture is considering the possible cancellation of the religious registration of the Jehovah’s Witnesses Religious Society. In response to public complaints, it has sent the organization a call to desist from illegal activities. It mentions damaging social ties, failure to provide adequate health care to children, and concealing some parts of its teachings. The Witnesses are resisting the ministry’s actions and denying any illegal actions.

https://avoidjw.org/news/czechia-five-ministerial-reprimands-jehovahs-witnesses-under-scrutiny/

episodes.title: Examining the Jehovah’s Witnesses’ Shunning Policy
episodes.description:
Jehovah’s Witnesses uphold a strict policy of shunning, claiming it is biblically mandated. They base this extreme form of social ostracism primarily on 1 Corinthians 5:13, often ignoring broader scriptural contexts. But does the Bible truly support the severity of their practice? A closer look at key passages reveals that their interpretation is flawed, inconsistent, and ultimately driven more by organizational control than by genuine biblical principles.

This article will explore three key issues with the Jehovah’s Witnesses’ shunning policy: membership, applicability, and severity. By comparing their approach to scripture, we will uncover how their policies contradict the teachings of Jesus and the Apostle Paul.

https://avoidjw.org/doctrine/examining-the-jehovahs-witnesses-shunning-policy/

episodes.title: Why Jehovah's Witnesses LIE in COURT
episodes.description:
JW.org Website says.."As a soldier of Christ he is in theocratic warfare and he must exercise added caution when dealing with God’s foes. Thus the Scriptures show that for the purpose of protecting the interests of God’s cause, it is proper to hide the truth from God’s enemies..."

episodes.title: Norway: “The Price We Pay” Jehovah’s Witnesses Appeal – Day 3
episodes.description:
Oslo, Norway—On the third day of the trial between Jehovah’s Witnesses and the state in Borgarting Court of Appeal, it was Jehovah’s Witnesses who were allowed to (lie in court) speak. 19 people will (lie) testify for the religious community during Wednesday and Thursday. It was clear that the religious community’s (liers) lawyers wanted to highlight examples that exclusion from the congregation does not mean social ostracism.

https://avoidjw.org/news/norway-the-price-we-pay-jehovahs-witnesses-appeal-day-3/
